amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress relating to the importance of long-distance passenger rail routes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3414 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 4. Record Vote Number: 169.

action.text: Amendment SA 3414 proposed by Senator Udall to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5339-5340; text: CR S5339) To express the sense of Congress relating to the importance of long-distance passenger rail routes.
